trans-unit.source:
If you have used the "kb_nescefe" extension already before, and updated the extension to the newest version 2.0.0 or later, you will need to run this update wizard once. Just press the "Update" button below. This will change some values in the tt_content table of the database.

WARNING: Before pressing the "Update" button you should make a BACKUP of your entire database or at least of the tt_content table. In case any problems occur during update you can then restore the previous situation!!!

The update was performed. Please take care if all nested content element containers show their contained content elements properly! Please note down the following data for reporting any problems: "%s"

You run this script after already having created container layouts. For this reason it is not possible to convert the old "tx_kbnescefe_containers" to the new "tx_kbnescefe_layout" table. You will have to merge them manually if you require any layouts/containers from the old table. Tip: Use the SQL construct "INSERT INTO SELECT FROM".
